games.summary: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander had 30 points and seven assists in three quarters, and the Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 137-106 on Sunday to extend their season-opening winning streak to seven games. Former Oklahoma star Jeremiah Fears , a rookie, scored 16 points for the Pelicans after getting a warm reception when he was introduced during starting lineups.
blurbs: 🆕 Jaylin Williams (OKC) made his first start of the season. 23 min, 12 pts.
📋 Aaron Wiggins (OKC) made just his 4th start this season. 15 pts, 1 reb.
📋 Jeremiah Fears (NO) made just his 4th start this season. 16 pts, 4 reb.

games.summary: Kelly Oubre Jr . scored 29 points, Tyrese Maxey had 26, and the Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Brooklyn Nets 129-105 on Sunday night.
blurbs: 🆕 Tyrese Martin (BKN) made his first start of the season. 27 min, 0 pts.
📋 Jabari Walker (PHI) made just his 3rd start this season. 2 pts, 4 reb.
📋 Adem Bona (PHI) made just his 2nd start this season. 2 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- — Miles Bridges scored 29 points, Kon Knueppel added a career-high 24 and the Charlotte Hornets routed the Utah Jazz 126-103 on Sunday night to snap a three-game losing streak.
blurbs: 📋 Collin Sexton (CHA) made just his 5th start this season. 10 pts, 4 reb.
📋 Sion James (CHA) made just his 2nd start this season. 15 pts, 5 reb.
🆕 Taylor Hendricks (UTAH) made his first start of the season. 25 min, 14 pts.
🆕 Jusuf Nurkic (UTAH) made his first start of the season. 22 min, 3 pts.

games.summary: Donovan Mitchell made eight 3-pointers and scored a season-high 37 points in his return to Cleveland's lineup, leading the Cavaliers to a 117-109 win on Sunday night over the Atlanta Hawks , who are navigating the early season without injured star guard Trae Young . He scored 24 points in the second half.
blurbs: 🆕 Larry Nance Jr. (CLE) made his first start of the season. 25 min, 2 pts.
📋 Jaylon Tyson (CLE) made just his 5th start this season. 18 pts, 3 reb.
📋 Nickeil Alexander-Walker (ATL) made just his 4th start this season. 16 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: RJ Barrett scored 27 points, Brandon Ingram added 26 and the Toronto Raptors won consecutive games for the first time this season by beating the short-handed Memphis Grizzlies 117-104 on Sunday night. led Memphis with 20 points, and Santi Aldama scored 15 but the Grizzlies lost back-to-back games for the first time this season.
blurbs: 🆕 Cam Spencer (MEM) made his first start of the season. 26 min, 4 pts.

games.summary: Jalen Brunson scored 31 points as the New York Knicks snapped a three-game losing streak and handed the Chicago Bulls their first loss of the season, 128-116 on Sunday night.

Devin Booker scored 28 points, Grayson Allen and Ryan Dunn each added 17 and the hot-shooting Phoenix Suns handed Victor Wembanyama and the San Antonio Spurs their first loss, 130-118 on Sunday night. The Suns' bench scored 50 points, led by Collin Gillespie 's 15.
blurbs: 📋 Royce O'Neale (PHX) made just his 4th start this season. 11 pts, 6 reb.
📋 Mark Williams (PHX) made just his 3rd start this season. 7 pts, 7 reb.

games.summary: Luka Doncic had 29 points, 11 rebounds and 10 assists, Austin Reaves scored 26 points, and the Los Angeles Lakers beat the Miami Heat 130-120 on Sunday night to extend their winning streak to three games. Jake LaRavia had 25 points off the bench for LA and Jaxson Hayes scored a season-high 15 points.
blurbs: 📋 Kel'el Ware (MIA) made just his 5th start this season. 7 pts, 4 reb.
📋 Pelle Larsson (MIA) made just his 3rd start this season. 17 pts, 5 reb.
